00012 #include <vector>

00014 #include "stxxl/bits/mng/mng.h"

00025 
00026 
00030 template <typename block_type>
00031 class buffered_writer
00032 {
00033     buffered_writer() { }
00034 protected:
00035     typedef typename block_type::bid_type bid_type;
00036 
00037     const unsigned_type nwriteblocks;
00038     block_type * write_buffers;
00039     bid_type * write_bids;
00040     request_ptr * write_reqs;
00041     const unsigned_type writebatchsize;
00042 
00043     std::vector<int_type> free_write_blocks;            // contains free write blocks
00044     std::vector<int_type> busy_write_blocks;            // blocks that are in writing, notice that if block is not in free_
00045     // an not in busy then block is not yet filled
00046 
00047     struct batch_entry
00048     {
00049         stxxl::int64 offset;
00050         int_type ibuffer;
00051         batch_entry (stxxl::int64 o, int b) : offset (o), ibuffer (b) { };
00052     };
00053     struct batch_entry_cmp
00054     {
00055         bool operator ()  (const batch_entry & a, const batch_entry & b) const
00056         {
00057             return (a.offset > b.offset);
00058         }
00059     };
00060 
00061     typedef std::priority_queue < batch_entry, std::vector < batch_entry >, batch_entry_cmp > batch_type;
00062     batch_type batch_write_blocks;      // sorted sequence of blocks to write
00063 
00064 public:
00069     buffered_writer(unsigned_type write_buf_size, unsigned_type write_batch_size) :
00070         nwriteblocks ((write_buf_size > 2) ? write_buf_size : 2),
00071         writebatchsize(write_batch_size ? write_batch_size : 1)
00072     {
00073         write_buffers = new block_type[nwriteblocks];
00074         write_reqs = new request_ptr[nwriteblocks];
00075         write_bids = new bid_type[nwriteblocks];
00076 
00077         for (unsigned_type i = 0; i < nwriteblocks; i++)
00078             free_write_blocks.push_back (i);
00079 
00080 
00081         disk_queues::get_instance()->set_priority_op(disk_queue::WRITE);
00082     }
00085     block_type * get_free_block ()
00086     {
00087         int_type ibuffer;
00088         for (std::vector < int_type > ::iterator it = busy_write_blocks.begin ();
00089              it != busy_write_blocks.end (); ++it)
00090         {
00091             if (write_reqs[ibuffer = (*it)]->poll())
00092             {
00093                 busy_write_blocks.erase (it);
00094                 free_write_blocks.push_back (ibuffer);
00095 
00096                 break;
00097             }
00098         }
00099         if (UNLIKELY (free_write_blocks.empty ()))
00100         {
00101             int_type size = busy_write_blocks.size ();
00102             request_ptr * reqs = new request_ptr[size];
00103             int_type i = 0;
00104             for ( ; i < size; ++i)
00105             {
00106                 reqs[i] = write_reqs[busy_write_blocks[i]];
00107             }
00108             int_type completed = wait_any(reqs, size);
00109             int_type completed_global = busy_write_blocks[completed];
00110             delete [] reqs;
00111             busy_write_blocks.erase (busy_write_blocks.begin () + completed);
00112 
00113             return (write_buffers + completed_global);
00114         }
00115         ibuffer = free_write_blocks.back();
00116         free_write_blocks.pop_back();
00117 
00118         return (write_buffers + ibuffer);
00119     }
00125     block_type * write (block_type * filled_block, const bid_type & bid)        // writes filled_block and returns a new block
00126     {
00127         if (batch_write_blocks.size () >= writebatchsize)
00128         {
00129             // flush batch
00130             while (!batch_write_blocks.empty ())
00131             {
00132                 int_type ibuffer = batch_write_blocks.top ().ibuffer;
00133                 batch_write_blocks.pop ();
00134 
00135                 if (write_reqs[ibuffer].valid())
00136                     write_reqs[ibuffer]->wait();
00137 
00138                 write_reqs[ibuffer] = write_buffers[ibuffer].write (write_bids[ibuffer]);
00139 
00140                 busy_write_blocks.push_back(ibuffer);
00141             }
00142         }
00143         //    STXXL_MSG("Adding write request to batch");
00144 
00145         int_type ibuffer = filled_block - write_buffers;
00146         write_bids[ibuffer] = bid;
00147         batch_write_blocks.push(batch_entry(bid.offset, ibuffer));
00148 
00149         return get_free_block ();
00150     }
00152     void flush()
00153     {
00154         int_type ibuffer;
00155         while (!batch_write_blocks.empty ())
00156         {
00157             ibuffer = batch_write_blocks.top ().ibuffer;
00158             batch_write_blocks.pop();
00159 
00160             if (write_reqs[ibuffer].valid())
00161                 write_reqs[ibuffer]->wait();
00162 
00163             write_reqs[ibuffer] = write_buffers[ibuffer].write(write_bids[ibuffer]);
00164 
00165             busy_write_blocks.push_back (ibuffer);
00166         }
00167         for (std::vector < int_type > ::const_iterator it =
00168                  busy_write_blocks.begin ();
00169              it != busy_write_blocks.end (); it++)
00170         {
00171             ibuffer = *it;
00172             write_reqs[ibuffer]->wait ();
00173         }
00174 
00175         assert(batch_write_blocks.empty ());
00176         free_write_blocks.clear();
00177         busy_write_blocks.clear();
00178 
00179         for (unsigned_type i = 0; i < nwriteblocks; i++)
00180             free_write_blocks.push_back (i);
00181     }
00182 
00184     virtual ~buffered_writer ()
00185     {
00186         int_type ibuffer;
00187         while (!batch_write_blocks.empty ())
00188         {
00189             ibuffer = batch_write_blocks.top ().ibuffer;
00190             batch_write_blocks.pop();
00191 
00192             if (write_reqs[ibuffer].valid())
00193                 write_reqs[ibuffer]->wait();
00194 
00195             write_reqs[ibuffer] = write_buffers[ibuffer].write(write_bids[ibuffer]);
00196 
00197             busy_write_blocks.push_back (ibuffer);
00198         }
00199         for (std::vector < int_type > ::const_iterator it =
00200                  busy_write_blocks.begin ();
00201              it != busy_write_blocks.end (); it++)
00202         {
00203             ibuffer = *it;
00204             write_reqs[ibuffer]->wait ();
00205         }
00206 
00207         delete [] write_reqs;
00208         delete [] write_buffers;
00209         delete [] write_bids;
00210     }
00211 };
00212
